metadata.Title: CVE-2017-13744 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
There is an illegal address access in the function _lou_getALine() in compileTranslationTable.c:343 in Liblouis 3.2.0.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-13744` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

liblouis-bin - 2.5.3-2ubuntu1.1
liblouis-data - 2.5.3-2ubuntu1.1
liblouis2 - 2.5.3-2ubuntu1.1
python-louis - 2.5.3-2ubuntu1.1
python3-louis - 2.5.3-2ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: liblouis package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.5.3-2ubuntu1.1').
